issues.description: The UML in the problem statement defines the attribute `abbreviation` in class `Ride` as type `String`, but the solution implementation uses `char` for `abbreviation`. This mismatch will confuse students following the UML (who will implement a `String`) versus the solution/tests (which expect a `char`).
issues.suggested_fix: Align the UML type with the implementation by changing the UML (`-abbreviation: String`) to `-abbreviation: char`, or update the implementation/tests to use `String` for the abbreviation attribute.
